optimal_cropping_points.description: Crop below the chest and above the knees for balanced image symmetry.

avoid_close_up.description: Avoid cropping that creates a close-up of the face.

avoid_cutting_at_feet.description: Avoid cropping at the feet. Showcase the complete subject for balance.

symmetry_guidelines.description: Ensure cropping maintains overall symmetry in the image.

centre_composition.description: Position the main subject in the center of the frame for balanced visuals.

horizontal_line_composition.description: Align elements horizontally to create balance and stability.

vertical_line_composition.description: Align elements vertically to emphasize height and structure.

symmetrical_composition.description: Create harmony using mirrored visual arrangements.

slash_composition.description: Use diagonal lines for dynamic and engaging visuals.

guideline_composition.description: Use lines to guide the viewer's eye naturally through the image.

avoid_overlap.description: Ensure the image subject doesn't overlap with the clock or other UI elements.

gap_requirement.description: Maintain a gap of a few pixels between the clock and the subject.

avoid_white_backgrounds.description: Avoid using images with white or bright backgrounds that obscure the visibility of the clock.

key_visual_area.description: Ensure that the key visuals are within the designated area and do not overlap with the top UI or bottom UI elements.

main_ui_area.description: Avoid placing the image focus in the main UI area (used for headline, CTA, and summary).

placement_and_fill.description: Use content-aware or manual fill to ensure no visible patches remain.

background_cleanup.description: Remove dust and unwanted objects from the background that divert attention from the main subject.

remove_tint.description: Remove unwanted tint and adjust the color temperature to achieve a natural look.

restore_skin_tones.description: Restore skin tones to their natural appearance to avoid over-editing.

brightness_contrast_saturation.description: Fine-tune brightness, contrast, and saturation to ensure the image is visually balanced and vibrant.

reduce_noise.description: Reduce grain and noise while retaining clarity. Apply slight sharpening for better details.
